Posts.Content: Hi I was dx today with ER+ bc and I am 43 years old with 2 small children! I was first dx in 2016 with TNBC and have done chemo rads and surgery! It’s now in my other breast but as ER+ and want to know more about this type of BC or if anyone knows of similar dx’s TIA
Posts.Title: ER+

Posts.Content: Thank you both for replying - waiting an MRI first to establish the exact size and whether it’s spread! Also booking in to get my mirena cook removed! Is there anything else I need to consider? Xx
Posts.Title: ER+

Posts.Content: Thank you! As I don’t have a lump or symptoms the bc was picked up on the routine mammogram which my consultant is surprised about as it’s measuring 5cm! They have advised me it is also not common that 14 months ago I was tnbc and now the new tumour is ER+! I have had genetic testing and from 15 genes I am negative for all despite having cancer now 3 times! I have taken flax seed previously but know this needs to stop - what other foods should I avoid? I don’t drink tea coffee or have cereal so milk not an issue but I do eat lots of yogurt and cheese!Â  I’m awaiting MRI to confirm size and lymph node involvement and I suspect I will have a CT re my organs! I take MSM which I’ll ask oncologist about and other supplements such as tumeric, fish oil and turkey tail - I’m note sure I will have chemo this time but knowing my onc she will want me to have it I’m more concerned about the side effects of tamoxifen and letrozole etc xxx
Posts.Title: ER+
